commit message:
Change DeckDropDownNavigation to Spinner

Change deprecated ActionBarNavigation in DeckDropDown widget to Spinner, also fixing the dropdown menu colors
Fix bug with statistics not always updating when changing deck (deleted too much code in previous commit)
Use EditText bottom line for duplicate warning

Fix 3 browser bugs
Crash when item pressed inbetween clearing cards and DeckTask finishing
Bug where search always cancelled prematurely under some situations
Too many cards getting rendered in background thread

Merge pull request #813 from timrae/md-browser-fix

Md browser fix

Material design version of account setup

Register and login pages placed in scrollviews to accomodate landscape
and small screens.
Also fixed state transition issues, allowing back/cancel to transition
rom account setup to login

Not done:
- Dialogs
- home/up button in action bar not implemented
Fix home button in action bar
